sub_title: Head of Technology & Product at OneLinQ | Open Banking Expert | API Platform Architect ( Financial grade APIs) | PSM™ and PSPO™
summary:
With an extensive professional journey spanning more than twenty years, I bring a wealth of expertise in constructing global web-based applications and cultivating teams within regulated environments. My practical experience in crafting SaaS-based products and nurturing businesses sets the stage for a dynamic leadership role as a Chief Technology Officer (CTO).

As a visionary Head Architect, I have successfully orchestrated the establishment of proficient teams, tools, and frameworks. This culminated in the development of robust, sustainable, and scalable platforms. My responsibilities span from curating critical decisions on platform components, ensuring security and scalability, to steering a team of engineers. I actively contribute to strategic product roadmaps while exploring the integration of AI and ML within the platform's framework.

With a specialization in API Architecture and a fervor for digital transformation, I excel in API design, including REST and SOAP methodologies. My comprehensive grasp of data modeling, database design, and an arsenal of programming languages including JavaScript and Java, empowers me to ensure the utmost security through concepts like OAuth, SSL, and tokens. Proficient in API management platforms and AWS, my communication and collaboration prowess fuels seamless stakeholder management.

The cornerstone of my achievements lies in designing and developing systems ranging from intuitive standalone applications to multi-tiered web architectures. My crowning achievement is the creation of a sub-second response time API Platform that seamlessly blends Performance, Scalability, Reliability, Availability, Extensibility, Maintainability, Manageability, and Security.

Throughout my journey, I've championed financial technologies across eminent institutions such as Commonwealth Bank, Commerzbank, State Bank of India, TD Bank, Intesa Sanpaolo, Equens, Santander, and many more. My expertise spans domains such as SWIFT, Payments, Compliance, and PSD2/Open Banking.
Underpinning my technical prowess is certification as a SCRUM Master (PSM I) and SCRUM Product Owner (PSPO I). My commitment to Agile methodologies fuels successful collaborations and streamlined workflows.
In essence, I am ready to don the hat of a CTO, backed by a proficiency in Java/JEE, AWS/AZURE Cloud, Kubernetes, Camel, REST APIs, SOAP Web Services, API Integrations, XML Technologies, and a demonstrated mastery of technical consulting, enterprise architecture, technology roadmaps, and more.

profile_positions.description:
As the Head of Technology & Product, my mission revolves around ensuring that our Platform and Products receive a dynamic boost from cutting-edge technologies and seamlessly meld with the overarching platform architecture. My foremost aim is to uphold the sturdiness, scalability, and high-performance standards of the underlying Platform and developed products.

Within this role, I spearhead the strategy, architecture, and design for the Pelican API Platform, orchestrating the creation of financial-grade APIs.

In parallel, wearing the hat of a Product Manager and Owner, I engage in meticulous market research, curating a well-charted product roadmap for the open banking realm. My commitment lies in transforming user stories into development-ready material, complete with precise acceptance criteria. Orchestrating the management and prioritization of the product backlog is my forte, with a laser focus on maximizing the value generated by the Scrum Team's endeavors. My collaborative rapport with the Scrum Master ensures a well-trained, motivated, and efficient team.

Additionally, I step into the Pre-Sales arena, lending support to the Sales department through captivating demos, impactful presentations, and direct client interactions to tackle intricate technical queries.

About OneLinQ:
OneLinQ propels businesses to flourish by harnessing the latest real-time digital platform innovations in Europe. Acting as a single global nexus, OneLinQ seamlessly manages all payment types, collections, and cash management, entwining efficiency, visibility, and control with the utmost security.

About Pelican:
Pelican stands as an encompassing suite of seamlessly integrated technologies, including AI, machine learning, natural language processing, real-time communication, and open APIs. This amalgamation empowers banks and corporations with solutions that elevate, streamline, and safeguard the payments lifecycle and financial crime compliance.
profile_positions.title: Head of Technology & Product

profile_positions.description:
Meet ThePragneshGandhi, the master of making faces twist into laughter knots and tears stream down from uncontrollable giggles. He's not just a stand-up comedian; he's a passionate, full-fledged chuckle engineer. You might say he's the brains behind converting your mundane days into comedy fiestas.

In 2021, he rocked the stage at the ICIN Event Eindhoven, leaving the audience wondering if they had entered a comedy dimension. Then, in 2022, he conquered the Diwali Celebration by Cultureroots Haarlem, proving that laughter is the best kind of firework.

But wait, there's more! Pragnesh doesn't just stand up; he also knows how to take charge of a social event like a true chuckle commander. He hosted GSNL Garba - 2022, Utrecht Garba - 2022, Hilversum Garba night - 2022 (yes, he's got Garba moves too!), and to top it off, he commanded the Eindhoven Diwali Mela - 2022. They say laughter is contagious, and with Pragnesh around, it's an epidemic!

Being an Indian comedian in the Netherlands is no joke, and Pragnesh has proven himself as the undisputed chuckle champion. People call him the best stand-up comedian in the country, which is quite the title when you're running a race all on your own (don't worry, we won't mention how many are in the race). His stand-up style is like a hilarious magnifying glass on everyday life, sprinkled with puns, one-liners, and stories that hit right at the funny bone.

What sets ThePragneshGandhi apart? He's not just a master of one language, but two! Yes, you read that right. He's fluent in Hindi and Gujarati, making him a bilingual comic genius. He can tickle your funny bone in multiple languages – talk about a linguistic laugh riot!

But that's not all. ThePragneshGandhi is not just a comedian; he's also a master at the art of bragging about his achievements. With a twinkle in his eye, he can recount his stage conquests and uproarious triumphs in a way that'll have you laughing even harder.

So, remember the name – ThePragneshGandhi.
profile_positions.title: Standup Comedian | Event Anchor

profile_positions.title: Development Head - Platform

profile_positions.description:
Profile Overview and Responsibilities:

Collaborated with the Product team to devise high-level designs for upgrading Pelican to support SWIFTRef directories.
Offered expertise in architecture consulting across enterprise architecture, application architecture, and IT strategy.
Established and maintained the technical delivery methodology, encompassing aspects from code standards and review procedures to unit test coverage and metrics reporting.
Demonstrated hands-on proficiency in architecting, designing, and developing complex Java / J2EE software applications with scalability in mind.
Implemented an embedded Tomcat server to enable HTTP[S] interfaces for Pelican servers.
Pioneered the architectural blueprint for transitioning Pelican towards a Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) or Cloud-based model.
Addressed limitations of the existing product through thorough analysis, and then architected, designed, developed, and executed a new Web services Framework using Java, Axis, Metro stack, Xerces, and XML for Interfaces.
Enhanced Pelican for cloud compatibility, focusing on GUI performance, Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA), Pretty Good Privacy (PGP), Secure File Transfer Protocol (SFTP), and CloudHSM integration.

Client Engagement:
Managed product migration, UAT support, and training for Capgemini in Apeldoorn, NL.
Conducted technical workshops to enhance product architecture for Commerz Bank in Frankfurt, DE.
profile_positions.title: Development Manager, JEE

profile_positions.description:
Profile Summary and Roles:

Elevated the PELICAN Application Server to meet stringent security, high-availability, stability, and high-performance benchmarks.
Designed servers for both active-passive (disaster recovery) and active-active (scaling and high-availability) configurations.
Augmented server capabilities for SWIFTNet file/message exchange using SAG (Software AG).
Conducted requirement gathering and gap analysis for product feature alignment.
Generated design documentation and detailed technical specifications.
Restructured a single institution product line into a Multi-Institution architecture to cater to Service Bureau clients.
Assumed responsibility for reviewing and resolving issues in junior team members' work.
Led internal and external training sessions and workshops.

Client Interaction:
Participated actively in Proof of Concept (POC) and demonstrations for Rabo Bank in Utrecht, NL, and Cedicam in Paris, FR.
Managed software integration, provided UAT support, and delivered training for Getronics PinkRoccade NV in Apeldoorn, NL, and Schroders Bank in London, UK.
Engaged in requirement gathering and technical discussions with Rabo Bank in Utrecht, NL, and Commerz Bank in Frankfurt, DE.
profile_positions.title: Senior System Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Profile Summary and Responsibilities:

Translated all Think GUI applications into browser-based, lightweight web applications.
Provided technical support to existing clients and effectively resolved production issues.
Designed, developed, and rigorously tested various workflows.
Demonstrated proficiency in documenting detailed use cases.
Created essential requirement artifacts such as technical requirement documents.

Noteworthy Client Engagements:
Actively participated in requirement gathering for ADCB Bank in Abu Dhabi, UAE.
Facilitated onsite software integration and provided UAT (User Acceptance Testing) support for ADCB Bank in Abu Dhabi, UAE, as well as for the Royal Bank of Canada in London, UK.
profile_positions.title: System Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Gained comprehensive comprehension of the current legacy language product lineup and seamlessly transformed it into a Java-based n-tier architecture.

Conceived and executed numerous modules using core Java and C.

Acquired proficiency in OFAC filtering and AML (Anti-Money Laundering) solutions.

Designed, developed, tested, and launched several auxiliary modules, including the Report Server and Archive/Dump tools, all within a single role.
profile_positions.title: Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Career Progression: Software Engineer >> Sr. Software Engineer

I have successfully implemented, tested, and provided support for web-based products named "BrokerEdge" and "DpEdge" using CGI-PERL, MySQL, and Apache on the UNIX platform.

I also played a pivotal role in designing and implementing products like "VirtualEx" using C++ and MySQL++ on the UNIX platform.

Furthermore, I contributed to the development of an HRIS (Human Resources Information System) using JSP, JAVA, Oracle, and PL/SQL on the Windows platform.
profile_positions.title: Software Engineer
